test_cases.name: Happy path: SUM aggregation
test_cases.question: sum the total marketcap in the last 30 hours
test_cases.expected_sql: SELECT SUM(marketcap) FROM coin_Bitcoin WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-07-05' AND '2021-07-06'

test_cases.name: Happy path: AVG aggregation
test_cases.question: average closing price over the last 7 days
test_cases.expected_sql: SELECT AVG(close) FROM coin_Bitcoin WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-06-30' AND '2021-07-06'

test_cases.name: Happy path: MAX aggregation
test_cases.question: maximum high price in the last 2 days
test_cases.expected_sql: SELECT MAX(high) FROM coin_Bitcoin WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-07-04' AND '2021-07-06'

test_cases.name: Happy path: Date range query
test_cases.question: average close between 2020-08-01 and 2020-11-30
test_cases.expected_sql: SELECT AVG(close) FROM coin_Bitcoin WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-08-01' AND '2020-11-30'
